captions.text: Look, the weather's amazing
The sky is so beautiful like our love
I can't stop smiling, I can't stop smiling
Han River flowing between high buildings
We bike in the breeze
I keep smiling, I keep smiling
Don't stop, keep riding toward the sunset
Don't stop, I love this moment, I love it
We both wanted to get away from the city
All the work piled up, all those words people say
We take in the fresh air
The river flows gently like our hearts
I ride behind you, your hips looking especially fine today
Makes me think of other things
You turn around see me daydreaming
You scold me, but you know what I'm thinking
Sitting with you like we have all the time in the world
Eating face to face
I can't stop smiling, I can't stop smiling
Maybe this is no special to others
But this time together means the world to us
I can't stop smiling, I can't stop smiling
Don't stop, keep riding toward the sunset
Don't stop, I love this moment, I love it
The sun sets in the west
We stop to gaze at its beauty
Looks like a painting, the river and its lovers with busy hands and lips
The sun closes its eyes to those secret whispers
People looking so happy, having beer on the green grass
Everything seems so peaceful in the city
I pedal after you, to the end of this road
You're my sunshine sunshine
The blue sky is your background
I can't take my eyes off your insane beauty
You're my sunshine sunshine
When the sun sets and night falls again
We ride, oh we ride
Don't stop, keep riding toward the sunset
Don't stop, I love this moment, I love it

comments.text:
this song is absolutely about Gary and Ji Hyo (monday couple). Ji Hyo once 
asked by someone, "Where do you think a great place to go?" then she 
replied "Going to Han RIver on the day, that's really great. Riding bicycle 
is also good. A place in the city where the laid back feeling can be feel"

Woah such a great and meaningful song!﻿

comments.text:

the vocals are battling against each other starting from 0:47 and that the 
extremely squeaky highpitched ending of the chorus is just unpleasant. 
Other than that, I like the rap, Jung In's unique voice, and the lyrics :) ﻿
